doctitle.textblock: Soo Line Railroad Co._Trackage Rights_Over a Line of Chicago, Central and Pacific Railroad Co. in Rockford, IL

summary.textblock: The Commission exempts from the prior approval requirements of 49 U.S.C. 11343-11345, the acquisition by Soo Line Railroad Company of temporary overhead trackage rights over approximately 4 miles of Chicago, Central and Pacific Railroad Company rail line in Rockford, IL, subject to conditions.

date.textblock: The exemption became effective on January 6, 1994. Petitions to reopen must be filed by January 31, 1994.

address.textblock: Send pleadings referring to Finance Docket No. 32446 to: (1) Office of the Secretary, Case Control Branch, Interstate Commerce Commission, Washington, DC 20423; and (2) petitioner's representatives, Terence M. Hynes and Molly A. Meegan, Sidley & Austin, 1722 Eye Street, NW., Washington, DC 20006.

further.textblock: Richard B. Felder (202) 927-5610; TDD for the hearing impaired: (202) 927-5721.

supplem.textblock: Additional information is contained in the Commission's decision. To purchase a copy of the full decision, write to, call or pick up in person from: Dynamic Concepts, Inc., room 2229, Interstate Commerce Commission, Washington, DC 20423. Telephone: (202) 289-4357/4359. (Assistance for the hearing impaired is available through TDD services (202) 927-5721.)
By the Commission, Chairman McDonald, Vice Chairman Phillips, Commissioners Simmons, and Philbin.
